statements: SELECT company_name, report_date, sentiment_score FROM EarningsReports
SELECT * FROM EarningsReports WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT report_date, company_name, stock_movement FROM EarningsReports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT company_name FROM EarningsReports
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score, stock_movement FROM EarningsReports WHERE stock_movement='up'
SELECT report_id, company_name, report_date, sentiment_score FROM EarningsReports WHERE stock_movement = 'Up';
SELECT * FROM EarningsReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM EarningsReports ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT report_id, company_name, stock_movement FROM EarningsReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EarningsReports WHERE company_name LIKE '%Tech%' AND sentiment_score > 0.75;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports
SELECT report_id, company_name FROM earnings_reports
SELECT date, report_text FROM earnings_reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT * FROM stock_predictions WHERE stock_price_change > 0
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_result FROM stock_predictions ORDER BY prediction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
SELECT report_id, date FROM earnings_reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT report_text FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, stock_price_change, prediction_result FROM stock_predictions WHERE prediction_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM earnings_report
SELECT company_name, report_date FROM earnings_report WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_price ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT report_id, company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_report WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_movement FROM prediction
SELECT * FROM earnings_report WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT company_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM earnings_report GROUP BY company_name HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3
SELECT e.company_name, p.predicted_movement FROM earnings_report e JOIN prediction p ON e.report_id = p.report_id WHERE p.predicted_movement = 'UP'
SELECT s.stock_symbol, SUM(price * volume) AS total_value FROM stock_price s GROUP BY s.stock_symbol HAVING SUM(price * volume) > 1000000
SELECT e.report_date, s.stock_symbol FROM earnings_report e, stock_price s, prediction p WHERE e.report_id = p.report_id AND s.stock_id = p.stock_id
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT company_name, report_date FROM earnings_reports WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT report_date, company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, report_date, sentiment_score FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM earnings_reports GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports
SELECT company_name, report_date FROM earnings_reports WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_reports ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT SUM(stock_price) AS total_price FROM stock_prices
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports;
SELECT company_name, report_date, report_text FROM earnings_reports WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
SELECT company_name, opening_price, closing_price, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY opening_price DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, prediction FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND prediction = 'Positive';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT company_name, report_date FROM earnings_reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_text FROM earnings_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-03-15' LIMIT 5
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, prediction FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT company_name, opening_price, closing_price, volume FROM stock_prices JOIN companies ON stock_prices.company_name = companies.company_name WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY volume DESC
